channel.title: Akash Pallath on Akash Pallath's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Akash Pallath on Akash Pallath's Blog

item.title: Deep Dreaming
item.description: I finally had the chance to implement Deep Dream as a part of my deep learning journey. It’s hard to find the time to code up computer vision algorithms that aren’t related to my research, but the stunning (albeit low-res) visuals that this produced were rewarding. Here are some cool images I managed to make. Deep dream of College Hall at the University of Pennsylvania. Original image from Penn’s public Flickr feed.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello reader! Watch this space, there’s a lot more coming soon! For now, you can check out my personal website.
